titleStmt.title: A proclamation for adjourning the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the fifteenth day of March, and of Our Reign the eighth year 1697.
Signed: Da. Moncreiff, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Adjourning the Parliament from "the eighteenth day of March instant to the eighteenth day of August next to come."
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
